dcterms:creator: J. Socher
A. Perelygin
J. Wu
J. Chuang
C. D. Manning
A. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: Stanford Sentiment Treebank provides around 11K sentences tagged with sentiment on a scale from 1 (most negative) to 5 (most positive). Neutral samples are filtered out, and the remaining sentences are dichotomized into positive (4,5) and negative (1,2).
dcterms:title: SST2

dcterms:creator: A. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: IMDB Large Movie Review Corpus is a binary sentiment classification dataset containing 50K polarized (positive or negative) movie reviews, split into half for training and testing.
dcterms:title: IMDB

dcterms:description: 20 Newsgroups contains around 19K documents evenly categorized into 20 different categories. For this study, samples belonging to baseball and hockey classes are extracted to create a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: 20NG
